import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { Task } from "./task"; export const Taskview = () => { const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { this.ItemSevice.getAll().then(data => setTasks({tasks : data})) return () => { cleanup } }, [tasks]) const taskList = tasks.map((m) => ); return (
